plot: The team find out which religion is the fastest with the help of a modified Subaru Impreza WRX STi. Richard tests a Saab 9-3; Jeremy drives a Lotus Elise 111S; Jason discovers if kids love supercars, and Rick Parfitt is the next star.

The team take a look at eco-friendly cars and Richard test drives the Saab 9-3. In the first part of a search for the world's fastest faith, six people from different religions take a Subaru Impreza WRX STI for a lap of the test track. Status Quo member Rick Parfitt is the Star In A Reasonably Priced Car.—Allister Coots

To find out which religion is the fastest around the track, the representatives of six different religions drive a powerful and completely modified Subaru Impreza WRX STi. In the meantime, Richard tests a first-generation Saab 9-3; Jeremy drives a rear-wheel drive Lotus Elise 111S, as Jason discovers if kids still love supercars. Lastly, English guitarist and Status Quo member, Rick Parfitt, is the next star in a reasonably-priced car.—Nick Riganas
